patthana19.7:1.1: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:2.1: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:3.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
